Title: Annabelle
Overview: A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.
Tagline: Before the Conjuring, there was Annabelle.
Keywords: prequel, evil doll, killer doll, spin off, doll, demonic possession, killer toys, toy comes to life
production_companies: New Line Cinema, The Safran Company, Evergreen Media Group, RatPac-Dune Entertainment
Cast: Annabelle Wallis, Ward Horton, Tony Amendola
